meanings: reveal the whole story about the secret funds scandal
the whole picture of the incident

meanings.meaning: when the full story is known

vlive.korean: 얼마 전에 모 연구소에서 발표를 했습니다. A research center recently made an announcement. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 이병헌+강동원+김우빈 <마스터> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: A research center recently made an announcement.

vlive.korean: [카메라도 깐모한테 가기 전에 심호흡 1109만번하고] 저는 이제... [The camera has to take a deep breath 11.09 million times] Now... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TWICE] 좌뇌에 필 스페셜 우뇌에 트둥이들로 빠지다못해 절여지는 중✨*.◟(ˊᗨˋ)◞.*✨(TWICE talking about their new album)
vlive.english: [The camera has to take a deep breath 11.09 million times] Now...

vlive.korean: [얘들아 클럽가면 모하니... 몬스타엑스 공연 와야지!] 전객석이 다 난리였어요. [Guys, come to a MONSTA X concert, not clubs!] the entire arena went wild. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 장충클럽 폭우로 찢어서 쩌어기 남산에 널어따🕺 (MONSTA X talking about their concert)
vlive.english: [Guys, come to a MONSTA X concert, not clubs!] the entire arena went wild.

vlive.korean: 얼마 전, 정산표를 받은 인기 그룹의 K모 군입니다. A few days ago, K, one of the members of a popular group received a statement of accounts. 듣기 View video WINNER : WINNER의 승승TV (WINNER'S WINWIN TV)
vlive.english: A few days ago, K, one of the members of a popular group received a statement of accounts.

examples.korean: The full horror of the accident was beginning to become clear. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사건의 참상의 전모가 분명해지기 시작하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The full horror of the accident was beginning to become clear. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The full story came out at the trial. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 재판에서 전모가 드러났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The full story came out at the trial. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I got the picture of his action. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그의 행동의 전모를 알게 되었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I got the picture of his action. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It throws light upon the whole affair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것으로 사건의 전모가 밝혀졌다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It throws light upon the whole affair. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is unimportant for us to know the full truth. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사실의 전모를 아는 것은 우리에게 중요하지 않다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is unimportant for us to know the full truth. Add to Wordbook
